      public Survivor(Board board)
      Constructs a new Survivor object with default values. Default values are: - Expert level: 0 - Action points: 3 - Life points: 5

    • getInventory

    • removeAllEquipment

      public void removeAllEquipment()
      Removes all equipment from the survivor, including the current equipment and those in the backpacks. After calling this method, the survivor will have no equipment.
